original_title: The Long Blondes: Cake Shop - NYC - Jun 22 2005
overview: The Long Blondes live in New York City, filmed and officially released on DVDr by Punkcast. Features the songs Lust In The Movies, Swallow Tattoo, Autonomy Boy, Big Infatuation, Once And Never Again, Appropriation (By Any Other Name), Gidddy Stratoshpheres, Seperated By Motorways and Darts.
title: The Long Blondes: Cake Shop - NYC - Jun 22 2005
